rules.description: Change spacebar to left_shift. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
Post escape if left_control is pressed alone.
コマンドキーを単体で押したときに、英数・かなキーを送信する。（左コマンドキーは英数、右コマンドキーはかな） (rev 3)

manipulators.description: option + command + h = option + shift + left (select word ahead)
shift + option + h = mouse left fast
shift + control + h = mouse wheel left
shift + command + h = mouse wheel left fast
option + command + j = option + shift + down (select para ahead)
shift + option + j = mouse down fast
shift + control + j = mouse wheel down
shift + command + j = mouse wheel down fast
option + command + k = option + shift + up (select line above)
shift + option + k = mouse up fast
shift + control + k = mouse wheel up
shift + command + k = mouse wheel up fast
option + command + l = option + shift + right (select word after)
shift + option + l = mouse move right fast
shift + control + l = mouse wheel right
shift + command + l = mouse wheel right fast
control + shift + enter = button1 (mouse left click)
shift + up arrow = mouse wheel up
shift + down arrow = mouse wheel down
shift + left arrow = mouse wheel left
shift + right arrow = mouse wheel right
shift + option + up arrow = mouse wheel up slow
shift + option + down arrow = mouse wheel down slow
shift + option + left arrow = mouse wheel left slow
shift + option + right arrow = mouse wheel right slow
shift + command + up arrow = mouse wheel up fast
shift + command + down arrow = mouse wheel down fast
shift + command + left arrow = mouse wheel left fast
shift + command + right arrow = mouse wheel right fast
option + up arrow = mouse up slow
option + down arrow = mouse down slow
option + left arrow = mouse left slow
option + right arrow = mouse right slow
command + up arrow = mouse up fast
command + down arrow = mouse down fast
command + left arrow = mouse left fast
command + right arrow = mouse right fast
command + ~ = area snap to desktop file
command + ~ = area snap to desktop file
command + ScrollLock = area snap to desktop file

rules.description: Change control + mouse motion to scroll wheel (rev 1)
Change button5 + mouse motion to scroll wheel (rev 1)
Change mouse buttons are pressed simultaneously
